cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on July 14, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 820, New Philadelphia National Historic Site Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 21 (Thursday, February 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LaHOOD:
H.R. 820.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
ARTICLE IV, SECTION 3, CLAUSE 2
The Congress shall have Power to dispose of and make all
needful Rules and Regulations respecting the Territory . . .
belonging to the United States . . .
[Page H387]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

title: New Philadelphia National Historic Site Act
